name: Escape 1.0
description:
"Escape 1.0" has been an on/off go-to project for quite some time now. It originally started as a small puzzle game with only 9 rooms, but it eventually grew into something bigger and more unique. In this world, time is always counting down.

The story begins with an anonymous figure who is wandering a solemn forest, when he comes across a static-like shadowy figure in front of him. The figure speaks to him, "The Grid has been set, and no players are left."

In this sidescrolling adventure, you will find colorful worlds with dangerous enemies, upgrades and relics that are hidden throughout, as well as an unnerving sense of something more sinister.  I hope you enjoy trying to uncover the secrets of the Grid!


Escape 1.0 features:

- 9 Colorful and Unique areas to explore

- Tons of wacky enemies to obliterate

- Intense and challenging boss fights

- An underlying psychological story

- A top-notch soundtrack from Teknoaxe and Evan King!
